headline: Citigroup (C) Extends Partnership with SMRT
summary: Citigroup Inc. (NYSE:C) is one of the Most Undervalued S&P 500 Stocks to Buy Right Now. On September 3, Citigroup Inc. (NYSE:C) announced that it has extended its partnership with SMRT as both companies mark 20 years of working together. The joint effort began in 2006 with the launch of the Citi SMRT Credit Card, which […]
